message: "The Dallas-Fort Worth area has approximately 6.8 million residents, so picture in your mind two-thirds of our entire region, and that's how many men, women, and children are in sex slavery in the world today."

data.description: Slavery is here and now -- and your awareness of the signs of trafficking and what to do about them can and will contribute to an increase in the...
data.title: Sex trafficking is a human crisis, and we must recognize and confront it
